description: KM: Find transaction log size and space used
body:
DBCC SQLPERF(LOGSPACE);

SELECT
    DatabaseName     = DB_NAME(database_id)
   ,file_id
   ,FileType         = type_desc
   ,LogicalFileName  = name
   ,PhysicalFilePath = physical_name
   ,TotalSizeMB      = CAST((size * 8.0 / 1024) AS decimal(10, 2))
   ,UsedSpaceMB      = CAST((FILEPROPERTY(name, 'SpaceUsed') * 8.0 / 1024) AS decimal(10, 2))
   ,FreeSpaceMB      = CAST(((size - FILEPROPERTY(name, 'SpaceUsed')) * 8.0 / 1024) AS decimal(10, 2))
   ,PercentUsed      = CASE WHEN size = 0
                                THEN 0
                           ELSE CAST((FILEPROPERTY(name, 'SpaceUsed') * 1.0 / size) * 100.0 AS decimal(5, 2))
                       END
FROM
    sys.master_files
WHERE
    database_id = DB_ID('tempdb')
ORDER BY
    file_id;
